.. It describes how to run the application to store the values and show the database.


Installation
++++++++++++

* To start the installation, first run the **./build.sh** in the terminal to check whether the required
  software's are installed or not.

* Now run the **./build.sh --install** to install the required virtual environment.

* Finally, run the **./build.sh --runmain** to run the application.

.. code-block:: console

    Project-3 $ ./build.sh
    project-3 $ ./build.sh --install
    project-3 $ ./build.sh --runmain

.. toctree::

    testing
